Body:
Description: Hi team,

this new customer has 780x DC+CAP for Win in use, file shadowing is not needed.
Please reach out to them and schedule a support session to adjust the resources and settings for the VM.
The customer asked to have that meeting on 26-Nov at 11 AM rom time.

Please also check the live update section in the management console in that meeting because an update caused some issues and that update is still visible although they are on 5.9.4.0

Please invite 
jan.asche@eu.panasonic.com
sebastian.pauli@eu.panasonic.com
christian.schalow@eu.panasonic.com
sascha.schroeder@eu.panasonic.com
to that meeting.

Thank you
Markus
